DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability BYM338 Patients With Sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis
DOC.criteria: Males Females age 4080 confirmed diagnosis sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis Unable walk least 3 meter without assistance another person Use oral beta agonist , oral corticosteroid , androgen androgen inhibitor , intravenous gamma globulin last 6 month patient history presence renal impairment and/or liver disease Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
